title: Casey, Our Arbiter of Truth
description:
Casey brings his iconic commentary to “Bachelor Happy Hour” this week as he discusses his time on “Paradise”! He addresses it all, from the shocking faint to who he was hoping to meet before his dramatic exit from the beach — there’s nothing our guy won’t share his opinion on. Plus, he gives his perspective on pre-“Paradise” chatting and matchmaking, and shares who he has unfinished business with. 

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
